document_data.caption: A map showing Ventris in the Korinn Archipelago.
document_data.name: Ventris
document_data.mainbody: '''Ventris''' was an island within the [[Korinn Archipelago]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Geography: Ventris was found near the center of the Korinn Archipelago. It was the largest single island among the group, covering approximately {{SI|375|sq mi|k|long=yes}}. An unnamed mountain passed through the center of the island, and forests were found along both the eastern and western coast.
document_data.Inhabitants: Populations of [[dwarves]], [[halfling]]s, and [[elves]] lived on the island.
